alternatives.transcript: it's a new business year for us so we need to look at the progress we've made over the last year and make certain we're moving in the right direction to meet our 1991 objectives but it's more than just a new business here we have a lot of the major lbo related issues behind us

and we're now part of a much more financially Sound Corporation despite adverse market conditions RJR Nabisco has retired or refinance 6.5 billion dollars of its existing debt as part of its recapitalisation program RJ are reduced its debt from twenty five point 1 billion dollars at the beginning of 1990s and to 18 point 1 billion
the end of 1990
the corporation's 1990 free cash flow was two point 1 billion dollars better than our plan

at the same time here at Reynolds tobacco we've also put a lot of organizational issues behind us and we have a brand new long-term strategic Direction in place it's time we move to a new agenda bringing this new company and its new mission to life with every single step we take this year it's time to build this business

now we expect the full price segment to continue to decline

key objectives for 1991 we will maintain strong earnings by minimizing our volume losses in the full price segment and aggressively reducing our operating cost we will improve the quality of our products packaging marketing and everything we do as a company

behave and act in their everyday jobs because when you're a recreator you don't care about organizational boundaries you don't care about politics you don't care about what you control you care about how you recreate the total business and you work as a team to do that
